Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/33rd
ShortDescription: 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, I-55, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, I-55, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/33rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central and #85A North Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Carmen
ShortDescription: SB 85 Central and 85A North Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Higgins, Gale, and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Carmen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central and #85A North Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Higgins, Gale, and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Carmen.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Carmen
ShortDescription: SB 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Central, Higgins, and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Carmen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Central, Higgins, and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Carmen.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: 69th, Damen, Marquette and Western; EB: Marquette, California, 71st, Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 69th/Bell due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Damen, Marquette and Western.

Eastbound buses will operate via Marquette, California, 71st, Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Chicago

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
